summary: Ever asked why would you spend 1000 gold for a horse in Skyrim? Well, with this mod you will need a mount if you want to be able to fast travel!
descriptionHtml:
[color=lime][b][center][size=8]Travel Mounts[/size][/b][/color][/center]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/sSbds.png[/img][/url][/center]

[size=4][color=yellow][b]Overview:[/b][/color][/size]
Ever asked why would you spend 1000 gold for a horse in Skyrim? Well, with this mod you will need a mount if you want to be able to fast travel! After a few seconds mounting your horse (or anything else you can mount actually) you will receive a message telling you are able to try to fast travel. Notice that any other requirement needed to fast travel, like not being near enemies, are still considered.

[size=4][color=yellow][b]INSTALLATION:[/b][/color][/size]
Just like any other Mod.

[size=4][color=yellow][b]UNINSTALLATION:[/b][/color][/size]
I don\'t think you might have any problem with this, but I recommend you save your game while mounted, then remove the mod. Just to be sure. =)

[size=4][color=yellow][b]COMPATIBILITY:[/b][/color][/size]
With any expansion, probably even with Dragonborn when it comes. I\'m not sure of this: you may have trouble or conflicts with other mods that also modify fast travel - like using the option in Frostfall to use firewood for fast travel - but I think it will actually work well.

[size=4][color=yellow][b]MESSAGES:[/b][/color][/size]
You can enable messages warning when traveling either by SkyUI MCM configuration menu or by typing in a console:
[i]set _TMDisableMessages to 3[/i]

[size=4][color=yellow][b]Can\'t travel, even mounted?[/b][/color][/size]
You can try to unmount and then type [i]EnableFastTravel 1[/i] on console and wait a few seconds to see if the mod kicks in.
author: Manaflow

files.name: Travel Mounts v101
files.changelogHtml:
Major fix: the mod wasn't working as it was supposed to.
Added the possibility to disable messages (set _TMDisableMessages to 1)

files.name: TravelMounts v102
files.changelogHtml: Disabled messages by default, SkyUI Config menu added.
